text: Anna Maria Dossena (1912–1990) was an Italian stage and film actress.Walman p.162 ==Selected filmography== * Television (1931) * The Old Lady (1932) *Music in the Square (1936) * We Were Seven Sisters (1939) * We Were Seven Widows (1939) * Empty Eyes (1953) * Il bambino e il poliziotto (1989) == References == == Bibliography == * Waldman, Harry. Missing Reels: Lost Films of American and European Cinema. title: Anna Maria Dossena
